bug.summary: Can't get mlagents-learn to use Tensorboard-gpu
bug.description:
Describe the bug So I'm trying to get the 3DBall example learning with my GPU instead of my CPU. In the tutorial provided you say that I need to uninstall Tensorflow and install Tensorflow-GPU (1.7.1). If I do that and run mlagents-learn I get an error saying it there's no module called tensorflow. Installing both just makes Tensorflow no longer recognize my GPU. To Reproduce
Uninstall tensorflow Install tensorflow-gpu (1.7.1)
Tensorflow recognizing my GPU after uninstalling tensorflow and installing tensorflow-gpu <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8294697/60732931-00e85f80-9f11-11e9-8f13-92082c4eac3e.PNG></denchmark-link>
Running mlagents-learn <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8294697/60733141-a8fe2880-9f11-11e9-8bc6-059813e20c90.png></denchmark-link>
Environment
Windows 10 ML-Agents version (latest, I installed it today) ML-Agents environment
